Text: great upload tnx, btw I got a question: can it be updated after instalation ?

Great upload thank you kadavul, you probably wont check this comment but if u do thnx, helping me alot i used free version for like 2 years but i was too much of a retard to think of pirate bay, thnx bro :D fast download btw guys.

I tried that serial DFF7A-8204E-69ADE-0D5AA
on the latest Version. v5.0.0.158 and it worked. I already had the free version installed prior to trying this. I disconnected from the internet and clicked on the "Free" button which opens up an activation window and pasted that number in there and hit activate or whatever it said and it gave me a message that it couldnt access the server and to try again later. I left all windows open, including the one with that message and reconnected to the internet and continued from there with no problems. It went right into the setup for the Pro version, just some settings to choose and Its the full version now and everything's enabled now. Anybody else who wants to try it that way please post and say if it worked or not. I really don't think it matters which version it is. I'm sure there's other ways to do it too, I just tried it this way and it happened to work. Keep in mind I downloaded and installed the free version from their site, not from here.

I too downloaded the free version, entered the key and sorry I can't remember which one as I had to try a few. There is one thing that I don't think has been mentioned and that is , you have to disable automatic updates before launch, otherwise once updated it reverts back to the free version. I hope this helps and thank you for the download, works great and will seed as long as I can
